text: 10.3: Ro 1.17; 9.30-32; Fi 3.9Mbe Fhe Bakɨme tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigir nzan kaai tɨv, mbe nen sagi fhuvara. Mbe nduarira wari won ŋaarir panan khaŋ wari ga nzuai, “Nza tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigi ma.” Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mbe fhura Fhe Bakɨme ganɨv ana piin kɨrim, ana nduara tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigir mben kamɨngeŋ thagi.
